articles.author: Andrei
articles.description:
As Bitcoin continues to consolidate around the $60k mark — we might see a movement into the mid 60’s, or a retracement back towards mid 50’s. Since Bitcoin is back up to $60k, I decided to run my crypto sentiment analysis bot and see how the market feels today, and determine whether there is any strong correlation […]
